npc_ai_param.MES: I am Solaria, captian of the starship Aurora. Please respond.
S.S Aurora calling nearby vessel, please respond.
This is Solaria of the S.S Aurora. Please contact me on the COMMS.
I've completed some research. Please talk to me.
A new research item is available.
I have a new upgrade available! Talk to me.
Good news, I have an upgrade to tell you about!
